# Describe Yourself

> Describe Yourself is a tool that allows you to generate text descriptions of yourself.

## Core Features
- [Free Describe Yourself](https://describeyourself.org): Choose context, enter brief self keywords, generate self description.
- [Pricing](https://describeyourself.org#pricing): List free and paid plans.
- [FAQ](https://describeyourself.org#faq): Frequently asked questions and troubleshooting

## Resources
- [Blog](https://describeyourself.org/en/blog): Information about Describe Yourself.
- [Legal](https://describeyourself.org/en/legal):  Privacy policy and terms of service.
